item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: wpthemego
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:
Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my website. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)
...or something like this:
The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.
As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

item.title: FAQs
item.dc:creator: wpthemego
item.content:encoded: [vc_row el_class="faq"][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text="FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS" use_theme_fonts="yes"][vc_tta_accordion][vc_tta_section title="How and when can I download the product after purchase?" tab_id="1500266188912-ed262903-cf54"][vc_column_text]After the payment process is completed, we will send you an email receipt with all order and download information, so you can download the installation package and use it for your website. In addition, you can instantly download the product from the download area[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="Is this a monthly price or a one-time payment?" tab_id="1500266188984-a17f3363-e9cf"][vc_column_text]The price you pay is one-time fee, with no hidden or recurring charges of any kind, and there's no limit on how long you can use the template or extension either[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="What payment methods do you accept?" tab_id="1500266328636-18f43f94-13c9"][vc_column_text]Credit card payment transaction will be taken care of by our trusted partnersÂ 2Checkout. They are truly professional with a very secure and reliable system. If you meet any trouble with the payment process, please contact us via email (myta@ytcvn.com) then our supporters will instruct you what to do.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="Can I modify the source code of product?" tab_id="1500266378158-51ec8c28-f6b5"][vc_column_text]Yes, you are authorized to make any modifications to achieve your desired intention. All code are open for modification if you need.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="How do I get product updates?" tab_id="1500266423428-31ef2d24-3165"][vc_column_text]We offer FREE lifetime update for all of our products. Youâ€™ll will be received the update notice in the theme admin. Also we will inform updates through email and our social channels.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="Can I use the themes and plugins on multiple websites?" tab_id="1500266448367-6bc3466f-5de0"][vc_column_text]Yes, you are free to use our themes on as many websites as you like. We do not place any restrictions on how many times you can download or use a theme, nor do we limit the number of domains that you can install our themes to.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="What if I change my mind and want a refund?" tab_id="1500266489828-24f52813-96b3"][vc_column_text]We offer no-questions-asked refunds to all customers withinÂ 30 daysÂ of your purchase. If you are not satisfied with our product, then simply send us an email and we will refund your purchase right away. Our goal has always been to create a happy, thriving community. If you are not thrilled with the product or are not enjoying the experience, then we have no interest in forcing you to stay an unhappy member.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="What if I change my mind and want a refund?" tab_id="1500266510338-c7ffdeb4-ea7a"][vc_column_text]Yes, we provide Theme Installation Service and Extension Installation Service, in which we will install the theme/extension like their demos for you within 24 hours. No other customization would be done.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="The purchased product just doesn't suit my need. Can I exchange it for something else?" tab_id="1500266538576-c15f910e-9d6c"][vc_column_text]Yes, the request should be raised up within 7Â days after your purchase date.Â We only give youÂ ONEÂ exchange. The second request will not be accepted.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][/vc_tta_accordion][/vc_column][/vc_row]
